summary: This document outlines the Articles of Incorporation for Gratitude America, Ltd., a non-profit corporation established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It details the corporation's purpose, management structure, and the responsibilities of its officers and directors, including Jeffrey E. Epstein as President.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is named as the President of Gratitude America, Ltd., responsible for administering the day-to-day affairs of the Corporation.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the President while Darren Indyke serves as the Treasurer of the same corporation.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the President while Erika A. Kellerhaus serves as the Secretary of the same corporation.
Both Brett Geary and Nicole Miller are listed as incorporators of the same corporation.

locations: 9100 Havensight, Port of Sale, Suite 15-16, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Gratitude America, Ltd. is incorporated as a non-profit corporation under the Virgin Islands Code.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is appointed as the President of the corporation.
The corporation's purpose includes supporting the expression of gratitude for the ideals of America.
The document outlines the management structure, including a Board of Directors and officers.
The corporation is intended to be exempt from federal taxation under Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code.
